Key Match Events: Andy Ibáñez delivered a three-RBI triple in the eighth inning of Game 2
Post-Match Reflections: The Astros failed to reach the ALCS for the first time since 2016
Miscellaneous Highlights: Detroit's own historic turnaround season will continue against the Cleveland Guardians in the ALDS
Others: This marks the first time the franchise has been swept out of the first round of the postseason since the 2001 NLDS
